Class ListBox<E>

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      GUI_Component
          WindowComponent
              ListBox<E>

public class ListBox<E>
extends WindowComponent

ListBox

Collection of Objects that is displayed in a list of rows. Acts very much like an ArrayList.

The collection's contents are shown via the Object's toString() method.

Scrollable when list is longer than height.

Implements single and multi selecting.

When has focus, can use "up" and "down" arrow keys to move selection index (when selection count equals 1) up and down through the list.

Action listener: hasChanged()

Version:
February 2011 - April 2014
Author:
Taylor Born

redraw

protected void redraw()
Description copied from class: GUI_Component
Called when a drawing Color or Font has changed. Overwrite to make your GUI_Component update its image. Does nothing if not overwritten. Not necessary to overwrite if the GUI_Component redraws itself every act cycle (though this is avoided for some GUI_Components).
